com.netflix.msl.crypto
Class AsymmetricCryptoContext

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.msl.crypto.AsymmetricCryptoContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICryptoContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
AsymmetricWrappedExchange.JwkRsaCryptoContext, RsaCryptoContext
public abstract class AsymmetricCryptoContext
extends Object
implements ICryptoContext

An asymmetric crypto context performs encrypt/decrypt and sign/verify using a public/private key pair. Wrap/unwrap are unsupported.

Constructor Detail

AsymmetricCryptoContext

protected AsymmetricCryptoContext(String id,
                                  PrivateKey privateKey,
                                  PublicKey publicKey,
                                  String transform,
                                  AlgorithmParameterSpec params,
                                  String algo)

Create a new asymmetric crypto context using the provided public and private keys and named encrypt/decrypt transform and sign/verify algorithm.

If there is no private key, decryption and signing is unsupported.

If there is no public key, encryption and verification is unsupported.

If #NULL_OP is specified for the transform then encrypt/ decrypt operations will return the data unmodified even if the key is null. Otherwise the operation is unsupported if the key is null.

If #NULL_OP is specified for the algorithm then sign/verify will return an empty signature and always pass verification even if the key is null. Otherwise the operation is unsupported if the key is null.

Parameters:
id - the key pair identity.
privateKey - the private key used for signing. May be null.
publicKey - the public key used for verifying. May be null.
transform - encrypt/decrypt transform.
params - encrypt/decrypt algorithm parameters. May be null.
algo - sign/verify algorithm.
